name: Simple Moments
description:
This game was developed in a week as an entry for the 2022 Amare Jam by The Cottage Workshop aka "Dom."

(Note: There will be at least one update to improve the game more.)

A collection of short but sweet moments between two close friends, you and your mentor.

Synopsis

You've been in love with your friend and martial arts mentor for years now. They are in love with you back. These are snippets of your lives together. 

Hui The Romance Option

Your friend of many years, Hui has a gentle and calm personality along with infinite patience (at least, as far as you're concerned). For a martial arts master with a rather mysterious past, they fluster rather easily - something you make sure to exploit to your heart's content. Not that they'd ever mind.                     

                             

More Info
  • 10k words for about half an hour (30 minutes) of gameplay
  • Nameable MC
  • Different scenes to experience - replayability 

Warnings: Hints of suggestive themes (flirting as well), minor blood/injury, minor bullying, minor cursing
